Usage¶

Requests in short¶

For using Patent2Net, you should be reasonably familiar with the CQL query language used for submitting queries to the Open Patent Services API.

Please follow up with these resources to learn something about CQL:

  • CQL query howto by EPO

  • The Contextual Query Language Specification

  • see also our web interface shortcut to build cql request Web interface

Operation¶

Patent2Net offers four modes of operation:

  • Web interface
  • Classic mode
  • Ad-hoc mode
  • Bash mode
